articles.description: Reaction to Thursday's Premier League matches after Chelsea stun Manchester United and Liverpool return to top of table, plus Friday's news conferences.
articles.title: Premier League reaction - Chelsea stun Man Utd, Liverpool back at top

articles.description: Inaki and Nico Williams' parents travelled to Bilbao from Ghana hoping the city would change their sons' lives. Their sons, in turn, have changed the city.
articles.title: Two brothers, one club and a 40-year wait

articles.description: Mauricio Pochettino believes Cole Palmer has proved that he is a "top player" after his hat-trick helped Chelsea secure a dramatic win against Manchester United.
articles.title: Impossible not to call Palmer top player - Pochettino

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from the first day of the 2024 County Championship season.
articles.title: County Championship: First day of the season - radio & text

articles.description: Max Verstappen sets the fastest time in Friday practice at the Japanese Grand Prix as the second session was rendered useless by the weather.
articles.title: Japanese Grand Prix: Max Verstappen tops first practice as Logan Sargeant crashes

articles.description: Ronda Rousey reveals she hid "concussions and neurological injuries" during her trailblazing run as UFC bantamweight champion.
articles.title: Ronda Rousey: Ex-UFC bantamweight champion 'hid concussions and neurological injuries'

articles.description: Liverpool battle to a win over Sheffield United to move back to the top of the Premier League and maintain control of the title race.
articles.title: Liverpool battle past Blades to return to top

articles.description: Denver Nuggets lose to the LA Clippers despite Nikola Jokic scoring his 24th triple-double of the NBA season.
articles.title: NBA round-up: LA Clippers beat Denver Nuggets despite Nikola Jokic brilliance

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler makes it successive Premier League Darts nightly wins with a 6-3 victory over Gerwyn Price in Manchester.
articles.title: Luke Littler beats Gerwyn Price to win successive Premier League Darts nights

articles.description: Akshay Bhatia shoots a nine-under-par 63 to lead the Texas Open after the first round, with world number two Rory McIlroy six strokes behind.
articles.title: Texas Open: Rory McIlroy six shots off lead as Akshay Bhatia sets pace
